p: With little precipitation and long periods of sunshine, northern China had a high light suitability index for potato growth over the past 50 years, with an average of 0.750. During the potato growing seasons (April-September) from 1965 to 2014, the average light suitability index of the potato showed an increasing trend, increasing 0.014 every ten years.The maximum value of light suitability index was found in 2013 (0.891), and the minimum value was found in 1995 (0.679).
